#summary Declaration of properties.

= Property declaration =
The syntax to declare a property is specified by:
<pre>_
property-declaration:
    annotations,,opt,, property-modifiers,,opt,, type identifier *{* accessor-declarations *}*
_</pre>

= Property modifiers =
<pre>_
property-modifiers:
    property-modifier
    property-modifiers property-modifier
_</pre>
<pre>_
constructor-modifier:
    *One of public protected private synchronized native strictfp final abstract virtual override static*
_</pre>

= Accessor declarations =
<pre>_
accessor-declarations:
    get-accessor-declaration set-accessor-declaration,,opt,, 
    set-accessor-declaration get-accessor-declaration,,opt,,
    
get-accessor-declaration:
    annotations,,opt,, accessor-modifiers,,opt,, *get* accessor-body
    
set-accessor-declaration:
    annotations,,opt,, accessor-modifiers,,opt,, *set* accessor-body

accessor-modifiers:
    accessor-modifier
    accessor-modifiers accessor-modifier
    
accessor-modifier:
    *One of public protected private* 
    
accessor-body:
    block
    ;
_</pre>

The Stab sample:
{{{
public class C {
    private int prop;
    public int Prop {
        get {
            return prop;
        }
        protected set {
            prop = value;
        }
    }
}
}}}
is equivalent to the Java program:
{{{
public class C {
    private int prop;
    @stab.lang.PropertyGet()
    public final int getProp() {
        return prop;
    }
    @stab.lang.PropertySet()
    protected final void setProp(int value) {
        prop = value;
    }
}
}}}
